channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WooCommerce Cart Abandonment Recovery
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WooCommerce Cart Abandonment Recovery

item.title: CVE-2024-2322|2024-07-05T17:22:24.577Z -- unknown -- woocommerce%20cart%20abandonment%20recovery
item.description: The WooCommerce Cart Abandonment Recovery WordPress plugin before 1.2.27 does not have CSRF check in its bulk actions, which could allow attackers to make logged in admins delete arbitrary email templates as well as delete and unsubscribe users from abandoned orders via CSRF attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-2322|2024-04-08T17:28:01.688Z -- unknown -- woocommerce%20cart%20abandonment%20recovery
item.description: The WooCommerce Cart Abandonment Recovery WordPress plugin before 1.2.27 does not have CSRF check in its bulk actions, which could allow attackers to make logged in admins delete arbitrary email templates as well as delete and unsubscribe users from abandoned orders via CSRF attacks.
